description:
Hurry to secure this Unique opportunity in the soon to be completed “Marine Quarter Residence”, boasting breath taking views in all directions, this is a one of a kind and will not last long !

Set atop of Tower 1 on level 28, lies the Creme De La Creme Penthouse of the new "Marine Quarter" residence, which features and unmatched amazing array of uninterrupted views from North over Stradbroke Island, South to Surfers Skyline, East over Broadwater and beyond to the ocean.

With 4 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, 2 car spaces and storage area, this magnificent penthouse can accommodate a wide range of lifestyles for those who won't settle for anything less than the absolute best.

Marine Quarter is the only approved residential development on the Broadwater Parklands, and is perfectly positioned on the waterfront side of Marine Parade, to deliver the ultimate Gold Coast lifestyle.

Features include;

- Meticulously designed to maximise its views through striking floor-to-ceiling glass.
- 4 large bedrooms (main with ensuite, Large WIR and balcony)
- 3.5 bathrooms ( 2 x ensuites )
- Huge open plan lounge, dining and kitchen area, extending out onto large balcony.
- Chef's kitchen with butler's pantry, full height cabinets and stone benchtops.
- Large windows promote unheralded levels of cross ventilation
- Fully ducted air-conditioning for year round comfort
- Easy access to entertainment lounge, gym, BBQ area and pool
- Secure 2 car parking (side by side) and storage space included
- Live on the park, by the sea just a short walk to Chirn Park's cafes & restaurants, Cafe Catalina in the parklands and minutes to Australia Fair.
- Due for completion in August 2023

The owner's plans have changed, and their instructions are clear, this Must Be Sold!
Call Brent Winston on 0414 545 355 for further details

Disclaimer:

* denotes approximate measurements.
